about_the_game:
Third-Person Action RPG: Slash your way through dangerous creatures with a variety of weapons. Search ancient ruins for upgrades and treasure while avoiding traps and solving puzzles. Explore a diverse island full of hidden secrets and wield a mysterious power.

ABOUT THIS GAME
Explore Wacambria Island’s vast landscape as a treasure hunter, adventurer all while fighting valiantly for the freedom of the local islanders. Search various biomes, caves, ruins and towns while unlocking treasures and solving puzzles in your quest to liberate the island.

Engage in Exciting Combat
Engage in satisfying combat as you save Wacambria Island. Your enemies will strafe, parry and work together to try and stop your valiant efforts. Utilize the variety of weapons and tactics to bring your foes to their knees.

Explore an Ancient World
Discover the secret of Wacambria Island as you explore various locations including ruins, caves, temples and towns. Wacambria Island is packed with secrets, treasure and danger.

Meet the Locals
Befriend the locals as you rise to the challenge of securing their freedom. The people of Wacambria Island are a friendly bunch. As you adventure through the Island you have the opportunity to engage and help them help you.
Buy and Decorate Your Home

Purchase one of many in game homes and decorate them to your hearts extent. Buy materials or use items you find on your adventure to create your own lavish living quarters.

Wacambria Island is a open-world, action RPG set on an island comprised of diverse biomes. Play as an adventurer whos search for treasure lands him in the middle of a drama between the local islanders and an invading army. With the island mostly controlled by the invading army, you will need to work together with the locals to gain back territory. This journey will take you across numerous biomes, caves, ruins and towns while discovering the secrets of an ancient power and a legendary hero. With the odds stacked against the local people, you will be the deciding factor of freedom in Wacambria Island.

Hi my name is Moses Doyle!
I'm a normal guy like anyone else, packing a lunch and heading out for a long days work. Later I come home and spend endless hours on animating a wobbly zombie attack while eating delicious burgers. I find inspiration in the small things in life and I'm pretty much entertained by anything. I started developing games over 22 years ago and since then I've had the pleasure of developing games such as side scrollers, top down strategies and first person shooters.
I am a self taught developer and Wacambria Island is built from my own game engine using C++ and DirectX. I've always had a passion to make adventure games and I'm very excited for you to experience the adventurous world of Wacambria Island! I've poured my heart into this game and have gone to great lengths to try to make the assets myself. Its a labor of love! Thanks for taking a moment to learn about me and I hope you enjoy Wacambria Island!

Psssst....Wishlist Today!

All original assets, characters, animations and game engine designed by Moses Doyle.
